casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Amanda AZEVEDO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 7, 2018 John R. Williams, in support of the petition. Robert J. Scheinblum, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 671 , 176 A.3d 1196 (2017), is denied.

KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
